description: Start the day with a bowl full of goodness when you combine Chobani Passionfruit Yoghurt with protein-packed seeds and nuts.
name: Healthier Passionfruit Yoghurt Bircher Bowl Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the oats, chia seeds, linseeds, 2 pots of Chobani Passion Fruit Greek Yoghurt, milk and apple juice in a large bowl. Cover with plastic wrap. Refrigerate overnight.

Meanwhile, heat a large nonstick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add the pepitas and almonds. Cook, stirring, for 2 minutes. Add the coconut. Cook, stirring, for a further 2 minutes or until lightly toasted. Remove from heat.
Stir in remaining Chobani yoghurt pot and extra milk in oat mixture. Spoon into serving bowls. Top with apple, raspberries, blueberries and toasted almond mixture.
